lead_paragraph: French riders' chances of winning the Tour de France have long been hampered by their inability to perform in time trials, but Thibaut Pinot's FDJ team have changed their approach and the youngster may now be ready to take on the best against the clock.

headline.print_headline: Pinot's Tour Hopes Boosted by FDJ's Time Trial Improvements
headline.main: Pinot's Tour Hopes Boosted by FDJ's Time Trial Improvements
